name: Brownie Chocolate Cake
description: A delightful fusion of rich brownie chunks and moist chocolate cake, all enveloped in smooth buttercream frosting.

name: Caramel Fudge Cake
description: Indulgent layers of moist cake with luscious caramel fudge and a smooth buttercream finish, perfect for caramel lovers.

name: Chocolate Fudge Cake
description: A classic rich chocolate fudge cake with decadent layers and a creamy buttercream frosting, a true chocolate delight.

name: Chocolate Hard Icing Cake
description: Moist chocolate cake coated with a firm, sweet chocolate icing, offering a delightful textural contrast and rich flavor.

name: Coffee Fudge Cake
description: Aromatic coffee-infused cake layers with rich coffee fudge and smooth buttercream, a perfect treat for coffee enthusiasts.

name: Dark Chocolate Cake
description: Intensely flavored dark chocolate cake with layers of rich dark chocolate buttercream, designed for the ultimate chocoholic.

name: Lemon Tart Cake
description: A unique cake inspired by the zesty flavors of a lemon tart, featuring tangy lemon layers and a creamy, sweet buttercream.

name: Special Chocolate Cake
description: Our bakery's signature special chocolate cake, a secret recipe with layers of moist chocolate cake and exquisite buttercream.

name: Strawberry Hard Icing Cake
description: Sweet strawberry flavored cake covered in a delightful firm strawberry icing, a fruity and fun choice for celebrations.

name: Vanilla Chocolate Fudge Cake
description: The best of both worlds: moist vanilla cake layers paired with rich chocolate fudge and smooth buttercream frosting.

name: Vanilla Hard Icing Cake
description: Classic vanilla cake with a sweet and firm vanilla icing, offering a simple yet timelessly delicious experience.

name: Walnut Brownie Cake
description: A decadent combination of rich brownie, crunchy walnuts, and moist cake layers, generously finished with buttercream.

name: Chocolate New York Cheesecake
description: Classic creamy New York cheesecake infused with rich chocolate, set on a chocolate cookie crust for an extra decadent treat.

name: Lotus New York Cheesecake
description: Irresistible New York cheesecake with a Lotus Biscoff cookie crust and a creamy Lotus Biscoff spread topping, a caramel-spiced delight.

name: New York Cheesecake
description: The quintessential dense, creamy, and rich New York style cheesecake with a classic graham cracker crust, often served plain or with a fruit coulis.

name: Almond Dry Cake
description: A subtly sweet and wonderfully moist dry cake infused with a delicate almond flavor, perfect for tea time or a light dessert.

name: Almond Macaroon Cake
description: A delightful cake featuring the distinct chewy texture and nutty flavor of almond macaroons, a unique treat.

name: Apple Dry Cake
description: A comforting and moist dry cake with tender chunks of sweet apple and a hint of warming cinnamon.

name: Chocolate Cheesecake (Dry Style)
description: A unique dry cake offering the rich flavor profile of chocolate cheesecake in a denser, loaf-style cake. Not a traditional creamy cheesecake.

name: Coconut Macaroon Cake
description: A delicious cake that captures the sweet, tropical essence and chewy texture of coconut macaroons.

name: Dry Cheese Cake
description: A savory-sweet dry cake with a subtle baked cheese flavor, offering a distinct and enjoyable taste experience. Not a creamy cheesecake.

name: Honey Almond Cake
description: A delightful dry cake sweetened naturally with honey and packed with the nutty goodness of toasted almonds.

name: Lemon Baig Cake
description: A zesty and refreshing lemon-flavored dry cake, with a wonderfully moist crumb, perfect for a light treat.

name: Pecan Caramel Cake
description: A rich and buttery dry cake featuring crunchy toasted pecans and swirls of luscious caramel flavor.

name: Plain Walnut Cake
description: A simple yet satisfying dry cake generously studded with crunchy walnuts, offering a classic nutty flavor.

name: Roasted Almond Cake
description: A flavorful dry cake with the deep, nutty taste of roasted almonds, providing a rich and aromatic experience.

name: Walnut Fudge Cake
description: A rich, fudgy dry cake packed with walnuts for a delightful crunch and intense chocolate-walnut flavor.

name: Walnut Honey Cake
description: A wholesome and moist dry cake combining the natural sweetness of honey with the earthy taste of crunchy walnuts.

name: Bakers Street Cake
description: Our signature Bakers Street special, a delightful fresh cream cake with unique layers of flavor and artistic decoration.

name: Belgium Chocolate Cake
description: Luxurious fresh cream cake made with fine Belgian chocolate for an intensely rich, smooth, and unforgettable chocolate experience.

name: Black Forest Cake
description: The classic German dessert featuring layers of chocolate sponge, whipped fresh cream, tart cherries, and delicate chocolate shavings.

name: Cadbury Chocolate Cake
description: A delightful fresh cream cake infused with the iconic, creamy taste of Cadbury chocolate, perfect for all ages and occasions.

name: Chocolate Chip Cake
description: Moist fresh cream cake generously studded with delicious chocolate chips throughout its layers for a delightful texture and taste.

name: Chocolate Fudge Cake Fresh Cream
description: Rich chocolate fudge cake layers beautifully balanced with light and airy fresh cream frosting for a decadent yet smooth treat.
image: /images/products/CAKE/FRESH CREAM CAKE/Chocolate Fudge Cake Fresh Cream.jpg

name: Coffee Chocolate Cake
description: A perfect pairing of aromatic coffee-infused sponge and rich chocolate, all enveloped in a light fresh cream frosting.

name: Dubai Style Kunafa Chocolate Cake
description: An exotic and luxurious fusion of traditional Middle Eastern Kunafa (crispy shredded pastry) and rich chocolate cake, with a fresh cream finish.
image: /images/products/CAKE/FRESH CREAM CAKE/Dubai Style Kunafa Chocolate Cake.jpg

name: Hazelnut Brownie Cake
description: Indulgent fresh cream cake featuring layers of rich, chewy brownie, crunchy toasted hazelnuts, and smooth, light cream.

name: Heaven Chocolate Cake
description: A truly heavenly experience with layers of ultra-moist chocolate cake and ethereal fresh cream, delivering pure chocolate bliss.

name: Kitkat Chocolate Cake
description: A fun and delightful fresh cream cake adorned with crunchy KitKat chocolate bars and rich chocolate ganache or shavings.

name: Milk Chocolate Cake
description: Smooth and creamy milk chocolate fresh cream cake, offering a gentle, sweet, and satisfying chocolate experience for all.

name: Oreo Fresh Cream Cake
description: A crowd-pleasing favorite featuring crushed Oreo cookies folded into luscious fresh cream and layered with moist chocolate or vanilla cake.

name: Pineapple Cake
description: A light and refreshing fresh cream cake with layers of soft vanilla sponge, whipped cream, and juicy pineapple chunks or filling.

name: Seasonal Fresh Cake
description: A delightful fresh cream cake celebrating nature's bounty, featuring the best and freshest fruits of the current season.

name: Three Milk Chocolate Cake
description: An ultra-moist chocolate sponge cake soaked in a decadent blend of three types of milk, topped with light fresh cream and a hint of chocolate.

name: Tiramisu Cake
description: Classic Italian dessert reimagined as a cake, with coffee-soaked sponge layers, rich mascarpone cream, and a dusting of cocoa powder.

name: Tiramisu Mocha Cake
description: A delightful twist on the classic Tiramisu, with an enhanced mocha flavor infused into its creamy mascarpone layers and coffee-soaked sponge.

name: Vanilla Brownie Syrup Cake
description: Layers of moist vanilla cake and rich, chewy brownie pieces, drizzled with a sweet syrup and finished with light fresh cream.

name: Caramel Crunch Mousse Cake
description: Smooth, velvety caramel mousse with delightful crunchy elements like praline or nuts, offering a perfect balance of textures and sweetness.

name: Chocolate Mocha Mousse Cake
description: An airy and rich mousse cake perfectly combining the deep flavors of decadent chocolate and aromatic mocha coffee.

name: Chocolate Mousse Cake
description: Classic decadent chocolate mousse cake, light and airy in texture but intensely rich in pure chocolate flavor.

name: Death by Chocolate Mousse Cake
description: An ultimate indulgence for chocolate lovers, featuring multiple layers of intense chocolate mousse, ganache, and moist chocolate cake.

name: Dream Chocolate Mousse Cake
description: A dreamy, light, and ethereal chocolate mousse cake that melts in your mouth, offering a cloud-like chocolate experience.

name: Java Mousse Cake
description: A sophisticated mousse cake with rich, bold coffee (Java) notes, perfectly balanced with creamy mousse for coffee aficionados.

name: Wafer Mousse Cake
description: Light and airy mousse cake with layers or inclusions of crispy wafer for a delightful textural contrast and subtle sweetness.

name: Banana Teacake
description: Moist and flavorful teacake made with ripe bananas and often a hint of spice, a comforting classic perfect with a cup of tea or coffee.

name: Carrot Teacake
description: A wholesome and delicious teacake packed with finely grated carrots, warm spices like cinnamon, and often nuts or raisins.

name: Fruit Teacake
description: A classic teacake generously studded with a variety of mixed dried fruits, offering a sweet, slightly chewy texture and rich flavor.

name: Ginger Teacake
description: A warming and aromatic teacake infused with the spicy zest of ginger, often with a moist crumb, perfect for a comforting treat.

name: Plain Teacake
description: A simple, subtly sweet, and buttery teacake with a tender crumb, the perfect unadorned accompaniment to your favorite hot beverage.

name: Rich Plum Teacake
description: A dense and flavorful teacake enriched with juicy plums, often with a hint of spice, ideal for a special tea time or dessert.
